name: paper-drip-client
description: Client side for Paper Drip, an origami community app

scripts.about: echo Use the about:suffix notation to find out more about packages or scripts. For example, type yarn about:help for options.
scripts.about: info: echo Why are these scripts here? && echo These scripts are here to keep track of what the code does in a human-readable way for newbie developers like me. && echo For more information, check out the README file!
scripts.about:babel: echo Babel core: main Babel package, a JavaScript compiler && echo Babel client: allows compilation from CLI && echo Env and React: compiles ES6 and JSX respectively into more traditional JavaScript.
scripts.about:yarn: echo Yarn: package manager && echo Yarn was chosen over NPM for front end due to its higher dependency download speed.
scripts.about:react: echo React: UI framework && echo React was chosen due to familiarity. However, it requires :babel and :webpack to properly compile.

author: Erin Han
